alert.note: Alert for Lawrence (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 16 at 9:39AM CST until February 23 at 9:00PM CST by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Lincoln IL has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Illinois... Embarras River at Lawrenceville affecting Lawrence County. .The following forecasts are based on observed precipitation, soil moisture conditions, and forecast precipitation. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY AFTERNOON TO LATE WEDNESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Embarras River at Lawrenceville. * WHEN...From Thursday afternoon to late Wednesday evening. * IMPACTS...At 33.0 feet, Kelly`s Lake Lane, 1160N, is inundated. At 36.0 feet, Billet-Vincennes River road is inundated. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:45 AM CST Wednesday the stage was 22.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage tomorrow afternoon to a crest of 36.5 feet early Saturday morning. It will then fall below flood stage next Wednesday afternoon. - Flood stage is 30.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (12 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Thu Fri Sat Embarras River Lawrenceville 30.0 22.2 Wed 8 am CST 25.2 35.6 35.2 &&
info.instruction: Persons with interests along this river need to prepare for flooding. Stay tuned for further updates on this flooding situation.
